successes.title: I DRAW COMICS Sketchbook & Reference Guide
successes.description: I DRAW COMICS Sketchbook & Reference Guide is an indispensable tool for comic fans, artists and enthusiasts to practice drawing comics.

Pledges.description: Thanks!  Every dollar counts - including this one!  We're gonna send you a thank you tweet just for being awesome.

Congrats!  You've pre-ordered a copy of the I DRAW COMICS Sketchbook & Reference Guide along with a branded I DRAW COMICS pen, all shipped to you in the US! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15) NOTE: If you'd like to add 1 or more books to any of the rewards, please add $20 per book and let us know so we send your extra books!

You are just too kind!  You're getting a copy of the I DRAW COMICS Sketchbook & Reference Guide with matching pen, but now we're throwing in a sweet I DRAW COMICS vinyl decal to throw on your ride, laptop, window - whatever!  Oh, and we'll also give you a shout-out on our website so everyone knows how generous you are! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)
THE DARK SIDE!  KICKSTARTER ONLY Collector's edition black cover book w/ pen and decal! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

Nicely done!  Not only are you getting hooked up with the book, pen, decal and website shout-out, but you're now getting a super high-quality Alternative Apparel Hoodie in navy blue with an I DRAW COMICS screenprint across the chest -  you know, just to tell everyone what you're about. (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

KICKSTARTER ONLY Collector's Edition Black Cover I DRAW COMICS Sketchbook & Reference Guide signed by Ryan Stegman. Oh - you get a pen, decal and hoodie, too!
  (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)  NOTE: Due to the limited quantity short run production, collector's edition not included in any other pledge tier unless specified!

Now we're talking! You're getting the full kit - A copy of the I DRAW COMICS Sketchbook, pen, decal, website shout-out, Hoodie and NOW Ryan is going to do an original Hero Head sketch INSIDE your book!  Perfect gift for the comic fan in your life! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

Respect!  You've got the book, pen, decal, website shout-out, hoodie, and NOW you're getting your name or website printed INSIDE the book on our Contributors page.  GET IMMORTALIZED! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

LIMITED EDITION BOOK + A SKETCH!  Ryan will do a sharpie sketch INSIDE the KICKSTARTER ONLY Collector's Edition Black I DRAW COMICS book!  Super-rare tier for you original art junkies! Oh - you get a pen, decal and hoodie, too! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

CON-SKETCH SPECIAL!  This pledge contains the full hook-up: book, pen, decal, website shout-out, hoodie, name or website printed inside the book and NOW Ryan is going to do a Con-style sketch of a character of your choice for you on 9x12 bristol board! Great gift!! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

Seriously?!  WOW!  You're getting all the gear: the book, pen, decal, website shout-out, hoodie AND your name or website printed inside the book! In addition to all that comic-y goodness you're NOW getting a Limited Edition autographed piece of Original Artwork by Ryan Stegman. Too Legit!  (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

ASPIRING ARTISTS! First you'll get ALL the gear - BOTH books, pen, decal, website shout-out, hoodie, name or website printed inside the book and NOW you get a 1 hour private portfolio review with Ryan over Skype!  He'll tell you what's working, where you need practice and he'll answer ANY questions you've got about art, life and how to make it in the comic biz!  (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

BEST. PLEDGE. EVER.  Do you own a comic book store and want to sell our stuff?  Get 10 books, 10 pens, 10 decals, 3 hoodies and the name of your store mentioned on our website AND printed inside the book on our Contributor's page.  'COMIC BOOK GUY' APPROVED!

IN-STORE SIGNING! Do you own a comic book store and want Ryan Stegman to come and sign books?!  This tier's for you!!  Get 10 books, 10 pens, 10 decals, 3 hoodies and the name of your store mentioned on our website AND printed inside the book, then Ryan will personally come to your location and sign books, talk shop - whatever! NOTE: Any and all travel expenses incurred are sole responsibility of pledger.

ULTIMATE FAN!!  You're so hopelessly devoted to comics that you're pledging to own the original art from Ryan's "First X-Men #1" Cover.  In addition to this rare gem you'll also receive the pair of I DRAW COMICS Sketchbooks (standard and black Kickstarter-Only edition, BOTH signed by Ryan) pen, decal, hoodie, website shout-out and your name or website printed in the book on our contributors page. DO IT! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

COMICS SUPER-FAN!  You get all the gear: the pair of I DRAW COMICS Sketchbooks (standard and black Kickstarter-Only edition, BOTH signed by Ryan) pen, decal, hoodie, website shout-out and your name or website printed in the book on our contributors page, and NOW you're getting original art from Ryan's "Scarlet Spider #7" Cover! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)

COVER ART SPECTACULAR! You get all the gear: the pair of I DRAW COMICS Sketchbooks (standard and black Kickstarter-Only edition, BOTH signed by Ryan) pen, decal, hoodie, website shout-out and your name or website printed in the book on our contributors page, and NOW you're getting original art from Ryan's "Fantastic Four #609" Cover! (CANADA/MEXICO SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $10, INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PLEASE ADD $15)
